data.description_suggestion: Generates a random trivia entry with a question and answer. Accepts optional parameters to filter by category or customize the trivia generation. data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a random trivia entry. Accepts an optional category parameter to filter trivia by specific category. Returns a trivia object containing a question, answer, and category information. If no category is specified, returns trivia from any available category.
